title: Pyodide Repodata Schema v0
description: a schema for a partial pyodide repodata index

info.description: Pyodide version for which this repodata is valid. Presently not generated, and discarded at runtime.

repodata-info.description: The pyodide version runtime for which this repodata will work

arch.description: The name of the architecture, e.g. ``wasm32``

platform.description: The name of the platform, e.g. ``emscripten_3_1_27``

depends.description: A list of PEP 503 normalized package names which this package depends on

file_name.description: A relative path or URL that resolves to a ``.whl`` file

install_dir.description: The destination for the package: currently only generates ``site``

name.description: The PEP 503 name of the package.

sha256.description: The observed sha256 hash digest of the package, which might be validated

imports.description: The top-level import names which will trigger installation of this package

a-pep-503-name.description: A python distribution name that conforms to PEP 503
